basics.name: Arvydas Jonusonis
basics.label: Software Engineer, Solutions Architect & Technical Leader
basics.summary: I am a hands-on software architect who enjoys collaborating, leading cross-functional teams and interfacing with customers. I am passionate about delivering robust, highly-operationalized software solutions, while fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation. My breadth of experience, ranging from full lifecycle software development, data engineering, operations and customer support, allow me to evaluate requirements through a wide lens.

work.summary: Data Management Platform and Solutions built on Apache Cassandra
highlights: Consult with customer application teams on data model design and database integration
Assist customer with capacity planning
Advocate for customer feature/hotfix requests
Educate customer on product features and best practices
Operational planning (planning, validation, execution of upgrades, feature rollouts, maintenance activities)
Perform Root Cause Analyses
Develop tools and scripts for customers to address gaps in product features
Guide and assist customer with database peformance testing
Database performance tuning
Implemented collection of and configured Grafana dashboards for Cassandra metrics
Migrated Cassandra configuration from Chef to Ansible

work.position: Cassandra Architect / Data Engineer / Engineering Enablement
highlights: Led effort to segregate unsimilar Cassandra workloads into separate clusters to improve reliability and reduce infrastructure costs
Migrated analytics Cassandra data from AWS to on-prem cluster using Spark Cassandra Connector
Migrated datamarts to Redshift
Evaluated and integrated Airflow into the stack
Developed maintenance tools (Spark jobs) for migrating and purging stale data
Developed Mysql to Redshift synchronization tool powered by Amazon DMS
Contributed to automating Cassandra infrastrucure (using Chef)
Contributed to integrate Datadog as de facto Cassandra monitoring solution
Performed adhoc analysis of Cassandra data (using Spark)
Contributed to the refactor of the lamdba stack into a micro-batch-based kappa flow powered by BigQuery
Implemented turn-key metrics solution for micro-services
Implemented Cassandra support libraries
Led a Cassandra optimization/enhancement project, which involved refactoring existing code, automating repairs, changing compaction strategies, migrating data to a new cluster, upgrade
Contributed to big data teamâ€™s implementation of lambda architecture by refactoring event stream ingestion API to integrate with kafka

work.summary: A digital marketing platform for SMBs
highlights: Puppetized ActiveMQ deployments
Developed health-check library (Java & Grails plugin) for use in all ReachLocal web/micro-services
Led and executed upgrade of Cassandra (DSE) cluster (2.2.1 > 3.0.9)
Led development of a unified, global call tracking system (CTS), integrated with Twilio telephony platform
Led POC of Solr as an indexing mechanism for Cassandra data
Led major refactoring of secondary indexes and other Cassandra data to make more scaleable and enable a crucial upgrade
Led Cassandra upgrade (0.6x to 0.8)
Led implementation of company-wide, global notification system (e-mail and push notifications)
Designed and implemented a distributed enterprise event-driven system (leveraging Cassandra and ActiveMQ)
